price: ߊ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߣߴߊߟߎ߫ ߝߊ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߍ߬ߘߍ߫ ߝߟߌ߬ ߘߐ߬ߜߍ߫ ߘߐ߫ ߘߋ߬߹
arabic: قَالَ لَقَدۡ كُنتُمۡ أَنتُمۡ وَءَابَآؤُكُمۡ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla laqad kuntum antum waābāukum fī ḍalālin mubīnin
